screen_desc: The screenshot displays a search interface, likely from a mobile app, showing recent search results. Other searches include job search and dating apps, such as "Indeed job search app" and "LinkedIn dating app." The interface shows a history of searches with icons to the right, likely for accessing or clearing the search results.
